Up.Statement: IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM w2_Payment WHERE payment_id = 'K80') BEGIN INSERT INTO w2_Payment VALUES ('0','','K80','','Amazon Pay','Amazon Pay','0',0,1,999999,'3',46,'0','0',GETDATE(),GETDATE(),'w2',''); END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE w2_Payment SET payment_name = 'Amazon Pay', payment_name_mobile = 'Amazon Pay' WHERE payment_id = 'K80'; END GO
